section.title: Gauges
section.p: All gauges are optional and may only be available if the XCSoar is connected to a supported instrument.

section.title: Variometer
section.p: A needle-dial style display shows the variometer measurements. The gross variometer reading drives the main arrow on the dial, and in the center of the dial the instantaneous measurement is written. Additionally, speed command arrows appear above or below the gross variometer measurement.
